tweet: On 2nd thought: Today is a GOOD DAY to FEEL GREAT! Lots of student conferences to do today and looking forward to them :-)
Restarting all of our computers after a bad electrical storm last night. Everything's back online now and working properly!
Phones are quiet so far today. That usually means students are working and studying hard. Make your bar study productive and focused :-)
I have full days of Student writing conferences Saturday and Sunday. The bar exam is starting to get real for our July class!
CA Bar Student call:"Your written materials are great.I can find information clearly & quickly. Much better than my 1L bar review books"
